Game: Phantasy Star II Text Adventure Volume 2- Nei's Adventure 1991 The game takes place in the spring of AW 1284, about 7 months before the events of Phantasy Star II. This chapter features Nei - a Numan created through an experiment to breed humans with biomonsters. After her escape from Neifirst, Nei has sought refuge at the home of an elderly couple, however, since Nei was not meant to exist, a bounty was placed on her. After being found by hunters, the home she belonged to was burnt down. Nei manages to flee to the nearby town of Paseo, where she wanders the streets looking for a place to stay.
